column4: cusco, what should i do first, type...  apt -cache search libssl0.9.6 in the command prompt?
gives me error mess:   sudo: apt: command not found
i wrote it in the command prompt
anyone has encountered problem installing yahoo messenger?
wanna share how to fix prob
is there a site in the net where to download missing packages? i need libssl0.9.6 package. yahoo messenger needs it.
I use psi without any problems and I believe it supports yahoo
well you need to install it first, so in a terminal type "sudo apt-get install psi qca-tls"
that should install psi and the ssl stuff it makes use of
actually I tell a lie, you will need to have a jabber account to use the yahoo stuff
so if you want to use a jabber account and attacjh your yahoo to it, grab psi. otherwise give it a miss
a quick way to find linux apps is on sourceforge.net
